member.name: M:Triggerfish.Testing.Web.Mvc.RouteInformation.DoesActionRequireAuthorisation(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Tests whether the route action requires authorization to be invoked, i.e. it is decorated with the AuthorizeAttribute

The full assembly name to which the controller class belongs
member.returns: true if the action requires authorisation, false otherwise

member.summary: Tests whether or not the action method is on the specified controller class
member.param: The name of the controller
member.returns: true if the action method is in the controller class, false otherwise

member.summary: Gets the name of the controller to which this route belongs
